name: v0.4.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "jq.bzl", version = "0.4.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "jq.bzl",
    sha256 = "21617eb71fb775a748ef5639131ab943ef39946bd2a4ce96ea60b03f985db0c5",
    strip_prefix = "jq.bzl-0.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/releases/download/v0.4.0/jq.bzl-v0.4.0.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

######################
# jq.bzl setup #
######################
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "53cadea9109e646a93ed4dc90c9bbcaa8073c7c3df745b92f6a5000daf7aa3da",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.21.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.21.2/bazel-lib-v2.21.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* feat: Mark extension as reproducible by @hofbi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/35
* fix: stray reference to bazel_lib jq_toolchains.bzl by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/36

## New Contributors
* @hofbi made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/35

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/compare/v0.3.0...v0.4.0

name: v0.3.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "jq.bzl", version = "0.3.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "jq.bzl",
    sha256 = "ca9ff09247d8b5fc56978b165c95306956c0d3b9659d4926c8da9c2ba2f6a5e6",
    strip_prefix = "jq.bzl-0.3.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/releases/download/v0.3.0/jq.bzl-v0.3.0.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

######################
# jq.bzl setup #
######################
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "53cadea9109e646a93ed4dc90c9bbcaa8073c7c3df745b92f6a5000daf7aa3da",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.21.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.21.2/bazel-lib-v2.21.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* feat: jq_test macro by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/30
* feat: port toolchain definition from bazel-lib by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/31
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/27
* chore(deps): update amannn/action-semantic-pull-request action to v6 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/22
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.21.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/19
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook keith/pre-commit-buildifier to v8.2.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/25
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v5 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/17
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.37.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/18
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v8.4.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/26
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook commitizen-tools/commitizen to v4.9.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/28
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook pre-commit/pre-commit-hooks to v6 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/16


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/compare/v0.2.4...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "jq.bzl", version = "0.2.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "jq.bzl",
    sha256 = "710ee87a6269fc78387fb55e998afc2ab30246d37e8e89bcf0774f7a75ffc733",
    strip_prefix = "jq.bzl-0.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/releases/download/v0.2.0/jq.bzl-v0.2.0.tar.gz",

######################
# jq.bzl setup #
######################
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "3522895fa13b97e8b27e3b642045682aa4233ae1a6b278aad6a3b483501dc9f2",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.20.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.20.0/bazel-lib-v2.20.0.tar.gz",

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: fix windows CI by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/2
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/.github action to v7.2.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/8
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_java to v8.15.1 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/6
* chore(deps): update bazel-contrib/publish-to-bcr action to v0.2.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/3
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v2.20.0 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/4
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook keith/pre-commit-buildifier to v8 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/13
* chore: remove docgen by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/14
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook commitizen-tools/commitizen to v4.8.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/7
* chore(ci): setup aspect workflows by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/15
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v8 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/11
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook crate-ci/typos to v1.35.3 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/9
* chore(deps): update pre-commit hook google/yamlfmt to v0.17.2 by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/10
* fix: don't use version 0.0.0 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/20

## New Contributors
* @renovate[bot] made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/8

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "jq.bzl", version = "0.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "jq.bzl",
    sha256 = "7b63435aa19cc6a0cfd1a82fbdf2c7a2f0a94db1a79ff7a4469ffa94286261ab",
    strip_prefix = "jq.bzl-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/releases/download/v0.1.0/jq.bzl-v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

######################
# jq.bzl setup #
######################
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_bazel_lib",
    sha256 = "2be8a5df0b20b0ed37604b050da01dbf7ad45ad44768c0d478b64779b9f58412",
    strip_prefix = "bazel-lib-2.15.3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/bazel-lib/releases/download/v2.15.3/bazel-lib-v2.15.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_bazel_lib//lib:repositories.bzl", "aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies", "aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains")

# Required bazel-lib dependencies

aspect_bazel_lib_dependencies()

# Register bazel-lib toolchains

aspect_bazel_lib_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* feat: port from bazel-lib by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/1

## New Contributors
* @alexeagle made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/jq.bzl/commits/v0.1.0
